CustomBehavior.Text: You meet the level requirement to run this profile.

Waiting 3 seconds - Food check - Clefthoof Ribs.
Distance from portal is not within our proximity, initializing movement to get there.
Waiting for the dungeon to load.
We are locked out. Waiting 20 seconds, then attempting to enter again .
Deleting unwanted items from our bags.
Waiting 35 seconds to be sure we aggro the patrol
Targeting the Bonechewer Ravener, DO NOT TOUCH !!!

Waiting 65 seconds to be sure we aggro the Bonechewer Ravener
Targeting the Bonechewer Destroyer, DO NOT TOUCH !!!
My target is Bonechewer Destroyer, casting Death Grip.
Waiting 60 seconds to aggro the patrol in case we missed him.

We can't reliably kill Watchkeeper Gargolmar until we reach level 69.
We are currently between level 69-70. Default Blood DK's using Singular as the combat routine should be averaging about 91 K XP/hr.
Waiting 3 seconds - Bag and durability check.
Waiting 3 seconds - Food check - Clefthoof Ribs.
